column3: Description
Completed performance faster than the ideal time.
Completed performance faster than the standard time.
Used between two and ten unique spell types.
Used two, three, or four unique spell types.
Took zero damage.
Restored zero HP.
Interrupted a target's casting.
Refrained from using Sprint.
Used one or more fire-aspected spells. Spells aspected to other elements were not used.
Used one or more water-aspected spells. Spells aspected to other elements were not used.
Used one or more earth-aspected spells. Spells aspected to other elements were not used.
Used one or more wind-aspected spells. Spells aspected to other elements were not used.
Used one or more ice-aspected spells. Spells aspected to other elements were not used.
Used one or more lightning-aspected spells. Spells aspected to other elements were not used.
Cast spells aspected to all six elements.
Used actions aspected to all six elements and three damage types (blunt, piercing, slashing).
Applied six or more unique enfeeblements.
Applied nine or more unique enfeeblements.
Used only physical-type actions.
Cast only rank 4 or 5 spells.
Cast only rank 1 or 2 spells.
Used four or more unique actions that are fired from the face.
Used eight or more unique actions that are fired from the face.
Use Pom Cure, Exuviation, and White Wind.
